Instruction: Heat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) in preparation and cover a baking tray with parchment paper.
In a bowl, combine the flour and salt then create a well in the middle. Into the well, add milk and oil and stir until a uniform dough is achieved.
On a surface with a slight dusting of flour, knead the dough until it attains a smooth and soft texture, approximately 10-15 minutes. Let the kneaded dough sit for a rest period of 15 minutes.
Separate the dough into 4 equal portions. Flatten each section with a rolling pin until it is 1/4-inch thick, then arrange them on the baking sheet that was prepared earlier.
Cook in the preheated oven until a light brown color is achieved, typically between 8 to 10 minutes.
